TEXT.TITLE: COLONIAL MUNICIPAL INITIAL OFFERING STARTS
TEXT.BODY: Colonial Municipal Income Trust said an initial public offering of 26 mln shares is under way at 10 dlrs each through underwriters led by Morgan Keegan Inc <MOR>, Bateman Eichler, Hill Richards Inc and Piper, Jaffray and Hopwood Inc. Underwriters have been granted an option to purchase up to 3,900,000 more shares to cover overallotments. Reuter
